name: Click a specified button in Claude
description: Single-step reusable workflow to click a specified AXButton in the Claude app window. Provide a reliable selector (accessibility label/identifier) for the target button.

parameters.name: button_selector
parameters.description: Accessibility label, identifier, or robust selector for the target button (e.g., label 'Send', AXIdentifier 'send-button').

parameters.name: window_title
parameters.description: Title of the window containing the button. Defaults to 'Claude'.
